attributes.action: Enforce cyclists to use cycle paths and help unclog our roads
attributes.additional_details:
Why do we pay taxes (and motorists pay more than most) to build thousands of miles of cycle paths, only to have cyclists continue to use the road when there's a cycle path a few feet from them?

Enforcment is needed in the way of fines for people holding up traffic when a purpose build path is sometimes only feet away.
